snippet: After a television report that players drank in the dugout during games, the beleaguered Red Sox issued a defiant statement.
lead_paragraph: After a television report that players drank in the dugout during games, the beleaguered Red Sox issued a defiant statement.

headline.main: Red Sox Deny They Drank in Dugout
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Deny They Drank in Dugout
headline.seo: Red Sox Deny TV Report They Drank in Dugout
